p: A current study has developed a novel formulation which is nanoemulgel from Ageratum conyzoides L. extract (ACE) combined with Oldenlandia corymbosa L extract (OCE), indicated as an anti-inflammatory agent. Nanoemulgel ACE-OCE has been developed either individually or in combination, having a good physical characteristic and promising effect from its activity as an anti-inflammatory agent for osteoarthritic therapy [ 101]. Table 3 organizes the type of extracts that have been formulated in pharmaceutical dosage forms regarding their corresponding active ingredient being studied previously for their molecular interaction in the protein targets of interest.
